title: Sonus Sponsors "Thinking UC - Think Microsoft Lync/Skype for Business" Tour
text:
Sonus Networks, Inc. 
WESTFORD, Mass., Sept. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- 
Key Takeaways: -- Sonus sponsors free "Thinking UC - Think Microsoft Lync/Skype for Business" tour to help enterprises maximize Microsoft Skype for Business deployments. -- Content presented by Sonus' Microsoft Unified Communication (UC) partners will provide migration strategies to Skype for Business Enterprise Voice whether on-premises, hybrid or in the Cloud. 
Sonus Networks , Inc. (Nasdaq: SONS), a global leader in enabling and securing real-time communications , today announced the Unified Communication (UC) tour, "Thinking UC - Think Microsoft Lync/Skype for Business." The tour is a series of free seminars intended to provide business decision makers, UC architects and enterprise strategists with insights for planning Skype for Business adoption and deployments. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150630/227189LOGO 
This tour is an ideal way for enterprises of all sizes to enter into discussions with Sonus' Microsoft UC Partners. Sonus' partners will provide strategic migration stories that detail the technical aspects of Skype for Business, such as interworking current communication infrastructures, securing networks for UC and best practices for deploying Skype for Business on-premises, hybrid or in the Cloud. Sonus partners hosting the seminars include: -- Strategic Products and Services (SPS) -- The Via Group -- New Signature -- House of Lync -- Emergent Networks -- Enabling Technologies 
For more information visit http://thinkskypeforbusiness.com/ 
Quote: 
"Microsoft Skype for Business, as a telephony solution, is expected to continue its rapid adoption rate through 2016," said Jim Dertzbaugh, vice president, Channel Sales, Sonus. "Sonus and our channel partners created this tour to educate attendees on how to build a Skype for Business roadmap and business strategy, while clarifying common points of confusion so attendees can understand how to make the most of this powerful platform."

About Sonus: 
Sonus brings the next generation of Cloud-based SIP and 4G/VoLTE solutions to its customers by enabling and securing mission critical traffic for VoIP, video, IM and online collaboration. With Sonus, enterprises can intelligently secure and prioritize real-time communications, while service providers can deliver reliable, secure real-time services for mobile, UC and social applications. Sonus offers an award-winning portfolio of hardware-based and virtualized Session Border Controllers (SBCs), Diameter Signaling Controllers (DSCs), Network-as-a-Service (NaaS) capabilities, Policy/Routing servers and media/signaling gateways. Visit www.sonus.net or call 1-855-GO-SONUS.
